Subject: A wolf, a Dragon, and a Bear go into a bar

Lunarpine stood back watching Megatons movements. The wolfbot was a
transmutant but he still considered Maximal ground to be his territory and
wolves didn't like any type of predatory creature in thier territory. "Did
Veratis send you?" he asked fearing what a monster of this size could do to
the scientists base.

"He created me." the Dragon replied. "I sent myself to this pathetic group."
the dragons grin was like a fox after a chicken dinner. "I had no idea that
other mutant existed." the creature of the dark ages stood tall. He was
striving for intelligence and made little secret of his motives.

"You'll get nothing more from me except my name, rank, and function." the
wolf bot stood tall. He was still nothing compared to his opponent but the
stubborn bot would not back down.

"Fine" A quick reply from Megaton caught Lunarpine off gaurd. "We can start
with that." The dragon smiled again. He was getting what he wanted from the
wolf in bots clothing.

Lunarpine was suspicious, this was to easy, Megaton had backed down way to
easily. "Ice Bird," he thought. He used her full name to show how serious
the matter was. "What can you see in his thoughts?" The meeting had turned
into a stareing contest between the two. Lunarpine had hoped Ice could hear
his thoughts.

Ice stood onboard the CF still unable to leave. Mentally she was still weak
from  pushing Lunarpine through the shields when she heard her name. She
tried to sense the other bot but couldn't read him very well. "I'm getting
something." She pushed herself trying to get a better read. She sensed the
dragons emotions, pain, anger, want, and something she couldn't quite
recognize, Megalomania. "Be carefull my love."She thought back to Lunarpine,
"This bots more than you'll ever want to know."
